productfeatures: Face Detection, Image Stabilization, Panorama Mode
dimensions: 3.7 inches high x 4.8 inches wide x 3.9 inches deep
label8: Continuous shooting L records 5 images in full resolution
label9: Continuous shooting M records 20 images at 8 megapixels
label3: This lens has a maximum aperture of f/3.1-5.9 and benefits from mechanical sensor shift type image stabilization to counter the effects of camera shake that become more apparent when working with longer focal lengths and in Super Macro mode
label4: Aspherical and ED lens elements are incorporated into the lens construction to reduce aberrations and color fringing throughout the zoom range
focusingtype: 25 Point Auto, 3 Point Auto, 9 Point Auto, Active Auto, Active Infra-Red Auto, Manual/Automatic, Passive Auto, TTL Contrast Detection, TTL Phase Detection
zoom: A super long Fujinon 30x optical zoom lens giving a 35mm equivalent focal length range of 24-720mm
resolution: 16 megapixel 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor provides impressive image quality
display: A 3-inch 230k dot LCD monitor provides a large, bright screen for live view monitoring, image review and clear menu navigation
